title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Clean board, initially the 60W charger would not work at all even with battery disconnected, after replacing;
U7100
Q7180
U7101
U7000
U7090
Q7010
Board now boots each time with 60w adapter but when the battery is connected there is no power or even any light on charger, at that point PP18V5_DCIN_FUSE is only 1.5V

With 85w adapter all works fine.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Charger detects leakage and gets protected.
Inspect for corrosion on input side; pay atention to R7012 and D7010.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
D7010 was already replaced with the other components mentioned before.
R7012 measures fine and there is no corrosion on that area.
New battery same problem.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Post actual values of R7180/81 and R7185/86; measured onboard, in ohm scale.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Did you solder new Q7180?

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Yes, but just in case I just put another one and same problem.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Tried another 60W original Magsafe 2 charger?

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: I don't have another one that is original, however this charger works fine on other macs

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: In working state (with 85W charger), post exact voltage for PPDCIN_G3H, DCIN_ISOL_GATE, DCIN_ISOL_BATE_R and PPDCIN_G3H_ISOL.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Board in MacBook case with everything connected including battery using 85W charger.

PPDCIN_G3H 16V
DCIN_ISOL_GATE 6.78V
DCIN_ISOL_GATE_R 6.78V
PPDCIN_G3H_ISOL 16V

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
"PPDCIN_G3H 16V"
Looks like 60W charger; 85W one should give 18.5V...

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
16.29V and it is 85W magsafe 2 original purchased at the Apple Store with original cable still installed, not sure why the difference.

MacOS also shows it as 85W under system configuration/power

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Try another DCIN board, just in case...

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Just did 5 seconds ago, same problem, now with 65W charger I am back at the same behavior as the start with battery wont start at all, without battery board starts sometimes after connecting and disconnecting charger multiple times.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
"with battery wont start at all"
With battery alone, or even battery and charger?

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Right now with board alone and battery connected and 65W adapter board will not boot and no light on charger at any point. 
Board alone and 65W charger board sometimes starts up.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Check CHGR_A/BMON, when both charger and battery are connected.
F7005 voltage drops in this case?

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: After a few seconds CHGR_AMON stayed at 1.2V and  CHGR_BMON 0.05V with 85W charger and battery connected with 65W charger and battery 0V and 0.06V.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: Im about to give on on this one, let me know what else to check [USER=682]@2informaticos[/USER]

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
"F7005 voltage drops in this case?"
In case of 60W charger; w/ and w/o battery.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Sorry I am a little confused as what you mean by voltage drop, when do I measure the drop?
With the 60w charger there is no voltage drop on F7005 with or without battery.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message: What is the exact F7005 voltage, with 60W charger; w/ and w/o battery connected?

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
With 60w adapter 16V without battery sometimes, most times 1V

With 60w adapter 1V with battery connected this is all the time.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
If drops to 1V, is because charger detects input leakge on the board.
Check all the components already changed.

title: 820-3476 Only charges with 85w power adapter
message:
Checked all components, all is good, the weird thing is that the problem is the exact same after changing the components.

Sometimes with battery disconnected and 60W charger board starts up fine, but not one time has it start with battery connected.
